Function openSQLiteDatabase(const string&, sqlite3 *&)¶

  • Defined in File file_system.cpp

Function Documentation¶

void openSQLiteDatabase(const string &database_name, sqlite3 *&database)¶

Safely opens a connection to the provided SQLite database.

Adds type safety for usage on different filesystems.

Parameters
  • database_name:
  • database:
